thread.title: Dustin Johnson and Paulina Gretzky reveal the gender of their baby with exploding ball
thread.title_full: Dustin Johnson and Paulina Gretzky reveal the gender of their baby with exploding ball

author: Brian
title: Dustin Johnson and Paulina Gretzky reveal the gender of their baby with exploding ball
text:
Feb 26, 2017 at 5:29p ET 0Shares 
Itâ€™s been a good week for Dustin Johnson. He became the new No. 1 ranked player in the world last Sunday with a dominant win at the Genesis Open, and this weekend he found out that a second son is on the way. 
Dustin Johnson and Paulina Gretzky are expecting their second child, and the couple found out the gender of the baby by having Johnson crush an exploding golf ball. A post shared by Paulina Gretzky (@paulinagretzky) on Feb 26, 2017 at 12:24pm PST 
Johnson and Gretzky welcomed Tatum Gretzky Johnson in 2015. 0
